snippet: The interview with President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, which took place on Sunday at the presidential palace in Damascus, will be broadcast on Monday by CBS and PBS.
abstract: Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad, in interview with television host Charlie Rose, reiterates his denial of chemical weapon attack on civilians; interview will be broadcast by CBS and PBS on same day Pres Obama is scheduled to make his case for military strikes against Syria.
lead_paragraph: The interview with President Bashar al-Assad of Syria, which took place on Sunday at the presidential palace in Damascus, will be broadcast on Monday by CBS and PBS.

headline.main: Assad Denies Chemical Attack in Interview for U.S. Viewers
headline.print_headline: Assad Denies Chemical Attack in Interview for U.S. Viewers
